Description: Configures the amount of free storage (in GB) that should be available on a datastore to launch the instance. Before launching an instance we will check that datastore has required_space (template+additional disks) + configure buffer.
Configures CPU metrics weight for VMware computer resource automatic placement.  Higher values for this setting hold more weight in automatic selection.
Configures memory metrics weight for VMware computer resource automatic placement.  Higher values for this setting hold more weight in automatic selection.
Configures disk metrics weight for VMware computer resource automatic placement.  Higher values for this setting hold more weight in automatic selection.
